items.sentence: Tom forgot to ask Mary what he had planned to ask her.
I wish I could help you, but I can\'t stay any longer.
I won\'t have enough time for everything I want to do.
Tom said he thought we shouldn\'t go to Mary\'s party.
Tom usually only wears his glasses when he\'s reading.
Tom certainly knew that what he was doing was illegal.
I\'m interested in learning how to fix a broken table.
We don\'t need to give Tom the money he\'s asking for.
Read as many books as you can while you are a student.
Salmon go up the river and lay their eggs in the sand.
